about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Leaders in Currency Exchange Services
about.description: Dar Al Mal Exchange is one of the leading currency exchange companies in the region, with extensive experience in currency exchange and international money transfers. We are committed to providing the best rates and the highest levels of service to our customers.

trust.title: Trust & Security
trust.description: Licensed and regulated by the relevant authorities
trust.detail: We believe that trust is the foundation of every successful relationship. That's why we uphold the highest standards of transparency and security in all our financial transactions. We hold all necessary licenses from the Central Bank and undergo regular audits to ensure the protection of your money and investments.

experience.title: Extensive Experience
experience.detail: Over more than 15 years, we have accumulated deep expertise in currency markets and international transfers. Our team includes seasoned experts in financial analysis and risk management, enabling us to offer the best rates and financial advice to our clients at all times.

service.title: Premium Service
service.detail: Customer satisfaction is our top priority. We provide a dedicated customer service team available around the clock, seven days a week, to answer your inquiries and help you complete your transactions smoothly and quickly. We strive to deliver an exceptional experience with every visit.

currency.title: Currency Exchange
currency.description: Exchange foreign currencies at the best competitive rates in the market

transfer.title: International Transfers
transfer.description: Transfer money worldwide quickly and securely

gold.title: Gold Trading
gold.description: Buy and sell gold and precious metals at live prices

consultation.title: Financial Consultation
consultation.description: Specialized consultation in investment and money management

1.question: What currencies can I exchange at Dar Al Mal?
1.answer: We offer exchange services for over 100 global currencies including USD, EUR, GBP, SAR, AED, and many more. Our rates are updated in real-time to ensure you always get the best price.

2.question: How long does an international transfer take to arrive?
2.answer: Transfer times vary depending on the destination country and transfer method. Express transfers arrive within minutes, while standard bank transfers take 1 to 3 business days. We provide real-time tracking so you can monitor your transfer status.

3.question: Do I need an appointment to visit a branch?
3.answer: No appointment is needed. Our branches are open Saturday to Thursday from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM. You can visit us anytime during working hours and our team will be happy to assist you immediately.

4.question: What documents are required for a money transfer?
4.answer: For local transfers, a valid national ID or residency permit is sufficient. International transfers require a valid ID, and additional documents may be requested for large amounts in accordance with Central Bank anti-money laundering regulations.

5.question: Do you offer services for businesses and corporations?
5.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive financial solutions for businesses including preferential exchange rates for large transfers, currency risk management services, and specialized financial consulting. Contact us to get a custom offer for your organization.
